title: Looking for a typography guru for Branding Exercise
content:
Hi, I am looking for an expert to help me design a typeface brand for a non-profit client of mine. If interested please contact me at [tzoldos@hotmail.com](mailto:tzoldos@hotmail.com). Let me know what your rates are, turn around time, and a link to portfolio work if possible.

Thanks
author: thomas146

comments.content: Are you looking for a custom typeface or a wordmark?
Also, the email address you posted does not work.
Sorry, [tzoldos@gmail.com](mailto:tzoldos@gmail.com) is my e-mail. I am looking for a wordmark.
